item.title: Celery's Journal Launch
item.description: ü•¨ Celery‚Äôs Journal Launch üóìÔ∏è DATE: 2025-11-26 üéÄ MOOD: calm & quietly excited üçµ NOTE: First journal entry! This space will collect work logs, study notes, inspirations and little tools. I want the blog to feel like a cozy digital notebook. Future sections will cover daily work notes, learning progress, idea sparks, favorite resources and mini projects.

item.title: Study Plan & Workflow
item.description: Focus Review Hugo + Relearn setup steps Capture commands so they can be reused later Expand the shared idea list Slowly building a repeatable workflow and preparing translations for the other languages.

item.title: Structure Review & Language Check
item.description: Reorganized the whole content tree to mirror the Relearn example, complete with multilingual bundles. Verified that the language switch toggles properly and noted tasks for future real content.
